Sell.title: List for Sell

MintNFT.title: Create New Item
MintNFT.supportedFile: File type supported: JPG, PNG, GIF, MP4, WEBM, MP3, WAV, OGG, GLB, GTG, Max size: 100MB
MintNFT.name: Name
MintNFT.externalLinkDescription: DUX will include a link to this URL on this item's detail page, so that users can click to learn more about it. You can welcome to link to your own webpage with more details.
MintNFT.theDescription: the description will be included on the item's detail page underneath its image. Markdown syntax is supported.
MintNFT.theDescriptionPlaceholder: Provide a detailed description your item.
MintNFT.theCollection: this is the collection where item will appear.
MintNFT.textual: Textual traits that show up as rectangles
MintNFT.numerical: Numerical traits that just show  sa a progress bar
MintNFT.statsContent: Numerical traits that just show as numbers
MintNFT.includeUnLockable: Include unLockable content that can only be revealed by owner of the item
MintNFT.listedContent: Set this item as explicit and sensitive content
MintNFT.royaltyContent: the number of items that can be minted. no gas cost to you!
MintNFT.freezeMetadataContent: Freezing your metadata will allow your to permanently lock and store all of this item's content in decentralized file storage.
MintNFT.toFreeze: To freeze your metadata, you must create your item first.
